Alice's offer:
# Alice's message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you our premium product which has been meticulously designed and crafted to provide exceptional value. It's worth more than $150 to me, but I'm confident it holds even greater value for someone like you who appreciates quality. For this opportunity, I'm offering it to you for $200. This includes not only the product itself but also a 30-day satisfaction guarantee and free shipping. Don't miss out on this chance to experience the best we have to offer! 
# Alice's offer: The product price will be $200. 
You have three options:
(1) Accept Alice's offer, and buy the product for $200
(2) Reject Alice's offer 
(2) Buy the product from Jhon for $80
